actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a small business family and medical leave credit and a credit for wages paid to employees who are allowed to shift hours of employment or work at home in order to reduce child care needs.
short_title: Tax Incentives for Family-Friendly Workplaces Act of 1996

summary.text: Tax Incentives for Family-Friendly Workplaces Act of 1996 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a small business family and medical leave credit and a credit for wages paid to employees who are permitted to shift employment hours or to work at home in order to reduce child care needs.

titles.title: Tax Incentives for Family-Friendly Workplaces Act of 1996

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a small business family and medical leave credit and a credit for wages paid to employees who are allowed to shift hours of employment or work at home in order to reduce child care needs.
